attributes.action: create a traffic-free multiple user cycle route (Greenway) along the Derwent Valley, Derbyshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The first stage from Cromford to Bakewell should be prioritised, and the whole route from Derby to Monsal Head (with a link from Rowsley to Ladybower) completed as soon as possible.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "create a traffic-free multiple user cycle route (Greenway) along the Derwent Valley, Derbyshire."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18839


Prime Minister's Office
